医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
氨基酸 PET 诊断脑肿瘤的新标准化标准弥漫性神经胶质瘤是恶性脑肿瘤，无法通过传统 MRI 成像进行最佳检查。所谓的氨基酸 PET 扫描能够更好地对神经胶质瘤的活动和扩散进行成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-standardized-criteria-for-diagnosing-brain-tumors-with-amino-acid-PET.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-standardized-criteria-for-diagnosing-brain-tumors-with-amino-acid-PET.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eda0f8e-c538-47b3-a7eb-51c00a7f06fe Wed, 03 Jan 2024 08:46:32 -0500 New standardized criteria for diagnosing brain tumors with amino acid PET
心脏健康饮食可提高心导管术前患者的满意度和安全性随着越来越多的证据允许患者在手术前进食，心导管术前长时间禁食的日子可能已经屈指可数了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Heart-healthy-diet-boosts-病人-satisfaction-and-safety-before-cardiac-catheterization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Heart-healthy-diet-boosts-病人-satisfaction-and-safety-before-cardiac-catheterization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19e7a25d-09ff-4936-b85c-7c982b7e5b85 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 08:41:29 -0500 Heart-healthy diet boosts patient satisfaction and safety before cardiac catheterization
新型运动方法为脑瘫儿童带来显着益处脑瘫 (CP) 儿童在参加昆士兰大学领导的一项具有里程碑意义的研究项目后，心血管健康和活动能力显着提高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Novel-exercise-approach-offers-significant-benefits-for-children-with-cerebral-palsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Novel-exercise-approach-offers-significant-benefits-for-children-with-cerebral-palsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=964db181-f41f-4b99-a38a-f93894ae913b Wed, 03 Jan 2024 08:23:08 -0500 Novel exercise approach offers significant benefits for children with cerebral palsy
研究发现人工智能是传播营养相关信息的一种有前途的工具两个版本的 ChatGPT 提供的营养信息的准确性和可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Artificial-intelligence-is-a-promising-tool-to-diseminate-nutrition-lated-information-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Artificial-intelligence-is-a-promising-tool-to-disseminate-nutrition-lated-information-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa2119d6-2d51-4846-92e7-397f0e3beab7 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:19:00 -0500 Artificial intelligence is a promising tool to disseminate nutrition-related information, study finds
发作性睡病患者面临药物短缺和耻辱的双重噩梦尼娜·尚德无法保持清醒。她从十几岁起就开始午睡，以适应自己“努力工作、尽情玩耍”的态度，但到了20多岁时，困倦变得更加严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Patients-with-narcolepsy-face-a-dual-nightmare-of-medication-shortages-and-stigma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Patients-with-narcolepsy-face-a-dual-nightmare-of-medication-shortages-and-stigma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=090a1ac6-7b94-4e78-b862-e27d1451e7db Wed, 03 Jan 2024 06:01:34 -0500 Patients with narcolepsy face a dual nightmare of medication shortages and stigma
